NK103(pe)014:1: // dri med gsang ba'i sgron ma bzhugs //
NK103(pe)014:3: lo kabi ma lagu h+yapra d+ain+aa ma /
NK103(pe)014:5: 'jig rten dri ma med pagsang ba'isgron mazhes bya ba //
NK103(pe)014:6: dpal bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK103(pe)014:7: gnas lugs rang snang phyogs med bde chen du lhun
NK103(pe)014:8: gyis grub pa'i ngang las mu bzhi'i phyogs su lhung
NK103(pe)014:9: ba'i dri mas dkrugs te brtags pa'i rdzas thag sbrul
NK103(pe)014:11: dri ma de'i mthus gdung ba'i las dang nyon mongs
NK103(pe)014:12: pa nyes pas bdag gzhan srid par 'khor ba nyam
NK103(pe)014:13: thag ste sdug bsngal brgyad dam gsum sogs bzod par
NK103(pe)014:14: dka' ba las // kun gyi rang bzhin ma nor
NK103(pe)014:15: ba ngo bo nyid kyi sku don gyis rang snang
NK103(pe)014:16: ji lta ba rig cing mngon du mdzad pa'i byin
NK103(pe)014:17: rlabs chos sku longs sku'i brdas bkrol te sprul sku
NK103(pe)014:19: ba de las gsung tshig tu byung zhing mi dang
NK103(pe)014:20: lha'i rig 'dzin rig pas brgyud mdzad pa'i dngos kyi
NK103(pe)014:21: bla ma klu rgyal dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lus
NK103(pe)014:23: 'gro ba rnams 'khor ba'i rkyen sreg pa'i 'dod chags kyis chos nyid thabs 2ma nor bas //
NK103(pe)014:24: legs 1par rtogs 3na sred pa bcos pa med par
NK103(pe)014:25: chos nyid rang sor bkrol ba'i thabs mngon sum pa'i
NK103(pe)014:27: de'i so la mi gnas par chags pa g.yon gyi lam gyis blo khrid de g.yengs ba //
NK103(pe)014:28: chags pa'i dug nyid la chags pa'i dug nyid kyis
NK103(pe)014:29: gsos su 'gyur bar bya ba'i bka' las grags pa
NK103(pe)014:30: de bdag gis bsdus te bshad par bya'o //
NK103(pe)014:31: don gyi gzhung chen gnas 'khrul rtogs goms 'bras bu lnga yis phyi'i khog byas la //
NK103(pe)014:32: byang chub sems su la bzla rnam pa dngos po dngos med gnyis gnyis med rnams la /
NK103(pe)014:33: bzhi yis mu matha'i the tsom gcad //
NK103(pe)014:34: tshogs brgyad skye lugs gsum gnas lugs lhun grub gsum
NK103(pe)014:35: mi 'da' rtogs thabs thug phrad gsum las mi 'da'
NK103(pe)014:36: goms thabs gzhag thabs gsum las 'da' ba med pa
NK103(pe)014:37: rnam pa gsum gyis rtog goms kyi rig pa 'i
NK103(pe)014:38: ngang bskyang // rtags dang mtshan ma gnyis kyis lam gyi rim pa tshad la dbab //
NK103(pe)014:39: thun mong ma yin pa'i nyag gcig gi klong chen nyid du thams cad dril te sbas //
NK103(pe)014:40: 'khrul pa'i dri ma med bar gsang bar 'dod nas gnas pa ni //
NK103(pe)014:41: nyon yid gzung ka'dzin yid spros khapa'i sgo lnga yul
NK103(pe)014:42: la mtshan gama'i ra 'dzin pa dri ma nyid du
NK103(pe)014:43: snang ba yang // rang karig khaspros bral sgyu gamar lhun grub pa //
NK103(pe)014:44: mtshan kanyid rang khabzhin rnam gapas rnam dag pa sa //
NK103(pe)014:45: dri ma med pa nyid rtogs par dka' bas sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams la gsang //
NK103(pe)014:46: rang grol ba'i man ngag skabs nyi shu rtsa bdun
NK103(pe)014:47: gyis dbye rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya nyi shu lngas
NK103(pe)014:48: rgyas gdab thig le drug gis spros pa bcad che
NK103(pe)014:51: lhan ma rtogs pas rgyu byas phyin ci log tu
NK103(pe)014:52: kun brtags pas rkyen byas pa'i dri mas 'bras bu
NK103(pe)014:53: snod bcud kyi 'jig rten du snang ba'i //
NK103(pe)014:54: tshul dang rnam pa'i grangs rgyas par dpa' bos gter gtad du bshad pa bzhin no //
NK103(pe)014:55: dri med gsang ba'i don de rtogs thabs kyi sgron
NK103(pe)014:56: mas 'jig rten gyi dri ma rang grol ba thob
NK103(pe)014:58: rnal ma'am bcos mas 'i dbang gi brda don sprad pa yang //
NK103(pe)014:59: dang po yin lugs bstan la de'i ngang du goms su gzhug pa'i thabs //
NK103(pe)014:60: dpa' bos dbang gi klong du bstan pas der shes par bya'o //
NK103(pe)014:62: de la ma gnas pa'am yang na blo gros zhan pa la //
NK103(pe)014:63: rlung dang thig le la sogs pa bcos mas 'i
NK103(pe)014:64: dbang gi rnal ma'i don mtshon par gsungs pa la
NK103(pe)014:65: // bla ma n+aa klu ga gu na'i yon tan
NK103(pe)014:66: snying po drin gyis gnod sbyin mo rang la shar
NK103(pe)014:68: thun mong bcos ma'i dbang la brten te rnal ma 'dir brda don sprad pa //
NK103(pe)014:69: ni rlung dang thig le la sogs pa gang yang
NK103(pe)014:70: rung ba la brten nas slob mas nyams su myong
NK103(pe)014:72: ma bcos rnal ma nyid du bstan pa'ang dbang klong du gsungs bas 'dir bshad mi dgos so //
NK103(pe)014:73: gong gi thabs kyis rtogs pa de la'ang ma gnas te chags pa g.yon gyi lam gyis khrid na //
NK103(pe)014:74: 'dra ba'i 'khrul gzhi lhun grub rnam pa gsum dbyer med pa'i lhun gnas bde //
NK103(pe)014:76: bde ba chen po dang 'dra ba'i tshul skye lugs rnam pa gsum la //
NK103(pe)014:77: log par spyad pas ngan song du ltung ba'i gnas su 'gyur //
NK103(pe)014:78: 'dra tshul de las dgrol zhing 'dra gzhi de nyid nges par mtshon pa'i thabs la gsum ste //
NK103(pe)014:79: sngon du 'gro ba tshang nas nyams su blang ba dang la bazla'o //
NK103(pe)014:80: gnas kyi khyad par skye bos dben zhing sdod nyams
NK103(pe)014:81: dga' mthun rdzas mod dgra bgegs kyis 'tshe ba med
NK103(pe)014:82: // pa'i gnas der yid rang gi phan tshun yid
NK103(pe)014:83: dang 'thad pa'i grogs bsten te blo dang mthun par
NK103(pe)014:84: rag mang na g.yeng ba dang 'dod pa 'phel nyung
NK103(pe)014:85: mi 'tsho bas skyon bral rang la gang mkho ba'i
NK103(pe)014:86: rdzas 'og nas 'byung ba ltar bsten la //
NK103(pe)014:87: gza' skar dang tshes grangs sbyor ba byed pa la
NK103(pe)014:88: sogs pa'am bkra shis dpon slob 'dzom pa'i dus su
NK103(pe)014:90: rten btsal bcud blang dbab gzung gyen la bzlog /
NK103(pe)014:91: gnas su bskyal tshe skyon bcos rtags la dbab //
NK103(pe)014:93: sngar lam ma bgrod par rtsol brgyad la sbyangs pa'am
NK103(pe)014:94: yang na sngar ma sbyangs kyang rigs rgyud dbang po
NK103(pe)014:95: chig chod de // blo gros mu bzhi'i phyogs su
NK103(pe)014:96: lhung 1ba dang kha zin 1dang ngo dga' 1dang bral
NK103(pe)014:97: chig chod de // 111ba // blo gzu bor spyi
NK103(pe)014:98: sa gnas pa'i slob bu de ni rgyal ba'i gdung
NK103(pe)014:100: de yang thabs dang shes rab phan tshun so sor btsal ba ni //
NK103(pe)014:101: shes rab kyis thabs btsal ba ni rgan po bdun
NK103(pe)014:102: cu lon pa'i zong zad byas pa bcu gcig lon
NK103(pe)014:103: pa'i zong ma rnyed ma ning bde bas gtan dbul
NK103(pe)014:104: ba dge slong ser snas bcings pa rnams min //
NK103(pe)014:106: dar la bab cing 'dod pa'i mes yid gdungs pa //
NK103(pe)014:107: blo gros rtsal can gdams pa'i rigs rgyud ma chad pa //
NK103(pe)014:108: shes rab yum la snying brtse zhing snyoms 'jug gi thabs la mkhas pa btsal lo //
NK103(pe)014:109: zhi ba thabs kyis shes rab btsal ba pad can
NK103(pe)014:110: de pa'i rigs rgyas pa dung can rat+na'i drag po
NK103(pe)014:111: ri mo las kyi dbang ba glang can pad+ma'i rigs
NK103(pe)014:112: bzhi po // re re'ang rab 'bring tha ma gsum gsum yod pa'i tha ma dor ro //
NK103(pe)014:113: dang po pad+ma can gyi rab ma mdog dkar tsan dmar ba dkar la dmar chags pa //
NK103(pe)014:114: lus ring thung ran cing lus byin du phra la khyad par rked pa phra //
NK103(pe)014:115: mig ni dkar nag phyed la mig rtsa dmar ba //
NK103(pe)014:116: dpral ba rgya che so dkar zhing thags bzang ste dam pa legs pa //
NK103(pe)014:117: yan lag phra 'jam dmar la shes rab gsal ba //
NK103(pe)014:118: phyi 1skye bo dang 'phyon mas nang 1rtog pas ting nge 'dzin slu 11ka lci la pha la gdung //
NK103(pe)014:119: skad snyan dri zhim ci yang ran la mdzes pa de //
NK103(pe)014:120: bde bar gshegs pa rnam snang gi rigs yin te de la sbyar na tshe 'dis dngos grub 'grub //
NK103(pe)014:121: 'bring ni sha dkar rus khyim che la rags //
NK103(pe)014:122: khong dal rdal che byed sdug spyod lam rtsings //
NK103(pe)014:123: las dang bya ba mkhas shing gzhan gyis blo dku dka' //
NK103(pe)014:124: rigs rgyud 'char na khye'u ru skye zhing thabs kyi bde ba lo yis 'grub //
NK103(pe)014:125: tha ma sha dkar bzhin sdug gsang mi thub //
NK103(pe)014:126: gzegs shing 'dzum snyi bzhin 'chos byi dor byed //
NK103(pe)014:127: mig phra blo ku sla ba de mi bsten no //
NK103(pe)014:128: dung can rab ni sha ser tsan ser la dmar chags pa dmar la //
NK103(pe)014:129: sha rgyas nu ma rgyas rtsa bzang mig bkrag che zhing phra //
NK103(pe)014:130: byed spyod mkhas tshul legs tshig brtan zur mig lta //
NK103(pe)014:131: go skyen blo gsal de sbyar tshe 'dis 'grub bo //
NK103(pe)014:132: 'bring ni sha ser che la nu ma rgyas //
NK103(pe)014:133: rgyab nas dgye la mdun rgu byad rngom zheng chung //
NK103(pe)014:134: byad ring kos ko legs shing mdun du ldem //
NK103(pe)014:135: snyoms 'jug 'dris nas snying nye thabs la dad pa can //
NK103(pe)014:136: blo gsal tshig ran bslu bar dka' ba ste //
NK103(pe)014:137: de dang rtsa sbyar lo ru mi thogs thabs kyi bde ba skye bas 'grub //
NK103(pe)014:138: tha ma sha ser mig 'bor che la rags //
NK103(pe)014:139: blo gsal 'gro 'dug lag pa'i 'du byed mang //
NK103(pe)014:140: mi brtan gtad chung gzhung ngan skyes pa rnams //
NK103(pe)014:141: mig la 'tsho zhing sdug pa yid la 'dzin //
NK103(pe)014:142: gzhan gyis bkri sla g.yem zhing skye bo mang po dang spyod pa de mi bsten no //
NK103(pe)014:143: ri mo can rab mdog sngo gdang la srab //
NK103(pe)014:144: lus dkyus ring mchu skor che zhing gnyen ma mang //
NK103(pe)014:145: mig legs 'dzum gsal skad snyan blo gros gsal //
NK103(pe)014:146: des che spyod 'jam dga' 'dris ched ka che //
NK103(pe)014:147: dben par dga' zhing rtsol ba dad gus can //
NK103(pe)014:148: de ni bkra shis dngos grub yo byad ldan //
NK103(pe)014:149: skye ba gcig gis de phrad 'bras bur smin //
NK103(pe)014:150: 'bring ni mdog sngo sha chung mig bkrag cing //
NK103(pe)014:151: khro gnyer ldan zhing skra sngo tshig bag gtum //
NK103(pe)014:152: brtul zhugs dad che shes rab sngags zlos dga' //
NK103(pe)014:153: 'dris nas 'bral dka' phyogs che 'dod pa chung //
NK103(pe)014:154: de bsten bkra shis don grub lo zlas 'grub //
NK103(pe)014:155: tha ma sngo nag dpral ba mig khung chung //
NK103(pe)014:156: kha 'dzum gting gnag skyes pa la dad che //
NK103(pe)014:157: khro skyen tshig gtum skra nag rtsub la 'dzing //
NK103(pe)014:158: gang 'phrad sbyor byed 'bral skyen de mi bsten no //
NK103(pe)014:159: ban glang can rab mdog dmar dkar la dmar chags pa tsan dkar ba //
NK103(pe)014:160: smin phrag ring zhing smin ma'i dkyus legs dpral ba che //
NK103(pe)014:161: gzangs su mi ring khong dal sngo gdu chung //
NK103(pe)014:162: slu khar lci la tshig nyung dad pa can //
NK103(pe)014:163: 'dris pa'i pha la gdung che blo dku dka' //
NK103(pe)014:164: de bsten bkra shis rgyu ldan tshe 'dis 'grub bo //
NK103(pe)014:165: 'bring ni mdog dmar gdong zheng che la bkrag che //
NK103(pe)014:166: lus khyim legs la dad cing nu ma sra //
NK103(pe)014:167: bzang che spro ring rang gi mdo mi 'chor //
NK103(pe)014:168: mi slus gdong ngom bsten par rung ba yin no //
NK103(pe)014:169: tha ma mdog dmar bzhin mdzes lus ran sdug /
NK103(pe)014:170: smra mang brdzun che tshig la mthon dman che //
NK103(pe)014:171: mgu sla khro skyen phyi thag thung ste rna gzhung ngan la slu ba sla //
NK103(pe)014:172: lus la byin dor mi dga' 'dod pa che //
NK103(pe)014:173: skyes pa sdug pa kun yid dbrog par sems //
NK103(pe)014:174: de yang mi bsten bkra shis rgyur mi 'thad do //
NK103(pe)014:175: pad dung gnyis cher rab tu basngagasa ban glang can yang 'bring du basngagasa //
NK103(pe)014:176: tha ma ri mo can yang bsten par rung ba yin //
NK103(pe)014:177: rab bzhi 'bring 'bri brgyad ldan rgyal ba'i sras mor bya //
NK103(pe)014:178: lo grangs ni yang rab bcu gnyis ma rab bcu drug ma //
NK103(pe)014:179: 'bring po nyi shu tha ma nyi shu lnga //
NK103(pe)014:180: yang tha bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yan chad gzung //
NK103(pe)014:181: shes rab kyis bzhi bcu lnga lon thabs kyis bdun cu lon //
NK103(pe)014:182: de dag zong zad bcu gcig zong ma rnyed //
NK103(pe)014:183: ma ning zong med dge slong dka' thub bcings la gsang ngo //
NK103(pe)014:184: lus kyi mthu bskyed pa dang rnal 'byor ting nge 'dzin nyid la gnas pa dang gnyis //
NK103(pe)014:185: mtshan dang ldan pa dang gsum po de 'dzom ma
NK103(pe)014:186: la lo grangs la rab 'bring tha ma'i na so
NK103(pe)014:187: brtsi rgyu med // de dngos grub nam yang 'byung /
NK103(pe)014:188: lnga bcu ma la 'jig rten gyi rigs rgyud 'phel ba 'ang srid pa //
NK103(pe)014:189: des na mtshan ldan gdam zhing lus kyi mthu bskyed
NK103(pe)014:190: pa dang rnal 'byor pas nyams su blang ba gces
NK103(pe)014:191: so // rten btsal ba de dag lus kyi stobs
NK103(pe)014:192: bskyed ba dang bcud blang pa dang brten par bya
NK103(pe)014:193: so // ba'o // kha zas sman dang dam rdzas
NK103(pe)014:194: dang sgo gsum gyi spyod lam gsum dang bzhi'i sgo
NK103(pe)014:195: so // ba'o // nas lus bskyed // bcud can
NK103(pe)014:196: zas gsar sha chang dkar 1mngar 1bu ram sbrang ka
NK103(pe)014:197: so // ba'o // nas lus bskyed // ra 11gsum
NK103(pe)014:198: // sgog pa skya'o 'o ma nad gzhi dang mthun
NK103(pe)014:200: rtsa ba lnga lca ba gze ma nye shing ra
NK103(pe)014:201: mo shags ka sho dang 'bras bu gsum la tsha
NK103(pe)014:204: 'bri mar mde dgu legs pas gzhi bzung la sman mar bya //
NK103(pe)014:205: gzhan yang 'o ma bskol ba ka ra mchil pa nas zan bye'u byid po'i sha /
NK103(pe)014:206: smigs pa lho sbas da byid bya gag gi sgo nga gzem rgya ma tsha //
NK103(pe)014:207: sbrang rtsi bu ral sgeg pa skya bo rtsa a
NK103(pe)014:208: ba rta bong rkyang gi bshul shas lus stobs bskyod
NK103(pe)014:209: // nyi gung lus mkhris bkru dgong ka bsku rlung
NK103(pe)014:210: mnye snga dro bad ran par bcag pho mo'i dbang
NK103(pe)014:211: po bsdam ste chags pa mi spyod //
NK103(pe)014:212: dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga po skyobs dang ldan pa rgyun du bsten //
NK103(pe)014:213: ldum bu re ral bcud can gyi mar la sbyar la gtang ngo //
NK103(pe)014:214: lus ngag yid kyi spyod lam dal bar bya //
NK103(pe)014:215: lus kyi nad gzhi sman gyi gzhung ltar cha bsnyam mo //
NK103(pe)014:216: bcud du blang tshe tsha rus pa rgas par byed
NK103(pe)014:217: skyur sha rgas par nyi ma dang me pags pa
NK103(pe)014:218: // khams dang mi mthun zas dang lus ngag gi spyod lam drag shul spang //
NK103(pe)014:219: zla ba drug tu dbang po'i sgo bsdam chags pa'i bsam pa'ang spang //
NK103(pe)014:221: mngar gsum mde gur sbyar la rtag tu gtang //
NK103(pe)014:222: gong gi sman gzhan tshan bskyed rtsam pa bsre //
NK103(pe)014:223: rus sbal gyi 'dug stangs dang h'u gi ngar skad
NK103(pe)014:224: dang rlung gis srog rtsa'i sbubs su bcud rnams drang
NK103(pe)014:225: bar bya'o // de brtan par byed tshe re zhig rtsam pa gcad //
NK103(pe)014:226: kha skyur tsha ba'i ro spang 'o ma bskol ba btung //
NK103(pe)014:227: ba ra'i mar sar shas tsam bsten rtsa ba lnga'i sman mar bsten ka sho nyung du bya //
NK103(pe)014:228: dam rdzas lnga'i gzhi la skyobs sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar //
NK103(pe)014:229: bzang sdug mu zi ser po gdul legs lce sogs gu gul dkar po dang //
NK103(pe)014:230: rgya tsha rdo chu bde cong zhi 'dzin sra ba can //
NK103(pe)014:231: de rnams la dri chus bar ma bran te bza' ba mchog tu shis //
NK103(pe)014:232: bzang sdug mu zi 'bras bu gsum dang 'bri dang ba'i mar //
NK103(pe)014:233: khal gsum la mu zi bre phyed /
NK103(pe)014:234: mde gu sbyar bsten ba ra'i 'o ma btung //
NK103(pe)014:235: zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhir gsang ba'i dbang po bsdam //
NK103(pe)014:236: btsan dug la gnyen po sngags sam thabs sman kyis btul ba bza' 'o //
NK103(pe)014:237: shes rab ma yang thabs kyi rjes su mthun te
NK103(pe)014:238: khyad par du 'o ma spos chus khrus bya bsku
NK103(pe)014:239: mnye ba bya // dam rdzas la sogs pa gang
NK103(pe)014:240: du bshad pa rnams kyis lus gsos la nas zan
NK103(pe)014:241: mnye ba bya // mchil pa dang // bye'u phyid
NK103(pe)014:242: po bya gag khyim bya pho rma bya phug ron
NK103(pe)014:243: mnye ba bya // mchil pa dang // dang // bya ma byi sha da byid smigs pa dang //
NK103(pe)014:244: ri skegs kyi sha dang sha sna dgu po de la tshod khu byas la gtang //
NK103(pe)014:245: rtsa ba'i lnga sman mar gtang dri bzang po yi thig le bya //
NK103(pe)014:246: ka ma la 'dod pa yi gdab pa'i gnas su
NK103(pe)014:247: gdab bzhib pa'i drug pa'i mnye ba'i gnas su mnye
NK103(pe)014:248: ba logs bas bstan bcos rgyas par bya ba //
NK103(pe)014:249: de yang rtsa gsum 111mnye zhing dbyings phyug btsal //
NK103(pe)014:250: glang chen sna 'dra 1ba dang rus sbal gyi rgyab 'dra 1dang //
NK103(pe)014:251: spen pa'i me tog lta bu 1dang gsum po de skye gnas kyi kha //
NK103(pe)014:253: lte ba bya gdong kha kha mu kha'i 'og na gnas pa manye'o //
NK103(pe)014:254: thabs 1dang sman 1dang mnu bas 1dang gsum gyi dbyings phyug mkha' de btsal 111te //
NK103(pe)014:255: 'o ma spos chus mgo lus phyi 1nang 1dam rdzas
NK103(pe)014:256: bsnyod la rtog pa dang dbral khrus 11bya dri sbyar
NK103(pe)014:257: spos dang dz+aa ti pha la dang shing tsha gur
NK103(pe)014:258: gum ga pur la sogs pa sbyar ba ste /
NK103(pe)014:259: sbrang rtsis sprus la ri lu byas te mur du
NK103(pe)014:260: bcug pas kha'i ngad bskyed lus la'ang byug par bya'o
NK103(pe)014:261: // ldan phyag gdub zhabs gdub snyan cha mgur chu
NK103(pe)014:262: do shal dar ber spu slag la sogs pa'i rgyan
NK103(pe)014:263: // gyis brgyan // 'bol gyi rgyab yol la sku
NK103(pe)014:264: rten khri stan dang ldan pa dang cod pan dar
NK103(pe)014:266: men nam ras la sogs pa'i rked chings ldan byas
NK103(pe)014:267: spos bre de'i ldos mkhal ma gnyis kyi steng nas
NK103(pe)014:268: bsdam shing gi dbyibs rdo rje'i tshul du byas pa
NK103(pe)014:269: // 'jam po snum bskus pas gnam 'phongs nas skye
NK103(pe)014:270: gnas su reg reg gtug cing rig mas 'og rlung
NK103(pe)014:271: 'bud de mi 'then par yan par gzhag /
NK103(pe)014:272: steng rlung mi drag par ran par mnan pas rtsa
NK103(pe)014:273: kha kha mu kha mthong bar 'byung ba yin de
NK103(pe)014:274: yang dung can ma la 'byung mnyam ma la 'byung
NK103(pe)014:275: du rung zhar ma la mi 'byung gsung //
NK103(pe)014:277: yang na a ka ru nag po dang rgya spos sad kyis ma khyer ba dang //
NK103(pe)014:278: du ru ska dang shing kun ga pur dang //
NK103(pe)014:279: ka ra mar dang bya gag 1nas zan 1gyi //
NK103(pe)014:280: sgo 11nga'i snying pos pri ser po sbyar la rgya shug gi 'bras bu tsam du dril //
NK103(pe)014:281: srin lag gi rtser bkal la rtsa gsum 'dzom sar
NK103(pe)014:282: bya gdong gi 'og tu drug zer yang sna rtse
NK103(pe)014:283: nyid la drud ces rje ri khrod pa gsung ngo
NK103(pe)014:285: yang na shing 'jam sbu gu zangs dung lta bu //
NK103(pe)014:286: kha che la zhabs chung ba la kha /
NK103(pe)014:287: che ba der gtad chung ba'i sbubs nas mchu btsugs nas barngubasa la sha sprin nam /
NK103(pe)014:288: rgyus pa bldad pas sbu gu bkag la de nas sbring nge yod pa de la mnu //
NK103(pe)014:289: lag pas dal bus shing gi sbu gu de dril zhing drangs pas rtsa phyir 'byung ba yin //
NK103(pe)014:290: kha kha mu rnyed pa des ni thig le gzung ba'am gyen la bzlog pa'ang nus pa yin //
NK103(pe)014:291: te rdo rje'i nang du chud nas 'ong bas so //
NK103(pe)014:292: dbab pa'i thabs la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbab pa
NK103(pe)014:293: dang thabs kyis dbab pa dang lha mo dngos kyis
NK103(pe)014:294: dbab pa'o // spyir rigs lnga dang bye brag rdo
NK103(pe)014:295: rje sems dpa' 'i ting nge 'dzin dang tsan+da l+ai
NK103(pe)014:296: dbab pa'o // gtum mo dang // 'od kyi lha
NK103(pe)014:297: mo la brten nas 'bebs pa ni gzhan sgyu 'phrul
NK103(pe)014:298: dbab pa'o // gtum mo dang // gyis gzhung ngo
NK103(pe)014:299: // mgrin pa longs spyod kyi snying po lce chung
NK103(pe)014:300: dbab pa la brten pa'i thabs dang gzhan gyi gzhung
NK103(pe)014:301: de'o gsum po 'di'i man ngag yid sbyin nor bu
NK103(pe)014:302: byi dor dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na gsal
NK103(pe)014:303: dbab pa'o // gtum mo dang // gyis gzhung ngo
NK103(pe)014:304: // bar yod do // dang por lag gi 'du
NK103(pe)014:305: byed la brten steng rlung gnan //
NK103(pe)014:306: lte ba'i 'og gi rtsa rgod ma'i kha dang rtsa rin chen rdzing gyen du brlab cing //
NK103(pe)014:307: 'og rlung 'then la rig par bde ba nyams su myong nas thig le gzung //
NK103(pe)014:308: skabs su rlung sbyang zhing rus sbal gyi 'dug stangs bya //
NK103(pe)014:309: bung ba'i skad kyis thig le drang dmigs pas kyang gyen la skya nar gyis thig le drang ba //
NK103(pe)014:310: de thabs des 'drongs par myong nas rten yum la sbyar ba ste //
NK103(pe)014:311: mkha' brlab ni pa'i 'phro 'du las pad+ma'i ge sar la am dmar po dang ldan bar bsam //
NK103(pe)014:312: h'u gi 'phro 'du las rdo rje ba gam la mo dkar po dang ldan par bsam //
NK103(pe)014:313: phata nag kyis rdo rje'i sbu gu dgag pa rnams
NK103(pe)014:314: kyis rten nyid gdung can nam rtsa rdo rje 'bigs
NK103(pe)014:315: byed btsal // rang mos pa'i lha'am rigs kyi bdag
NK103(pe)014:316: por kun po rang nyid gsal bar bya ba ni
NK103(pe)014:317: byed btsal // // rang gzhin spros bral gyi /
NK103(pe)014:318: ngang la mtshan nyid rig pas rang 'od rnam pa sgyu ma'i sku //
NK103(pe)014:320: gsum 'dus shing lhun gyis grub par gsal nas bgegs
NK103(pe)014:321: bskrad pa dang rang bsrung ba dbang gi klong ltar
NK103(pe)014:322: bya // sngar bshad pa'i dri zhim gon pan dz+aa ti shing tsa yis //
NK103(pe)014:323: dri zhim dang ldan chas kyis klubs //
NK103(pe)014:324: zhes dbang gi gal por gsungs so //
NK103(pe)014:325: thig les gnas brgyan rol pa'i bstan 'khyud pa gnyis
NK103(pe)014:326: dang gnas bcu gcig tu tsum+bi bya 'o ba dang
NK103(pe)014:327: / gnas bdun du dung gi phur pa so gdab
NK103(pe)014:328: pa dang bzhib pa lce nu ma gnyis gsum dang
NK103(pe)014:329: / / sen thabs kyi gnas dgu dang /
NK103(pe)014:330: gnas bcu gnyis su tha mal pa'i sen mo gdab pa dang /
NK103(pe)014:331: bsnam par byas pas gdab pa'i gnas lnga dang 'bur
NK103(pe)014:332: gnyis sna gdong gtugs la brtse ba cung zad tsam
NK103(pe)014:333: byas te zhes gal 'grel las 'byung ba ltar /
NK103(pe)014:335: yab yum phan tshun bsnol mas gnyis ka'i bde ba rgyas par bya //
NK103(pe)014:336: mdo la rol bar bya ba min te bstan bcos
NK103(pe)014:337: kyis bde ba rgyas nas gzod yab yum mnyam par
NK103(pe)014:338: sbyar // sbyor pa'i thabs ni phyi nang gi lha
NK103(pe)014:339: mo bzhi bzhi brgyad dam dbang gcig car 'jug pa
NK103(pe)014:340: las mnyam pa nyid kyi skyil mor 'dud kha snol
NK103(pe)014:341: dang mthil sbyor rtse sprad dang /
NK103(pe)014:342: rting sprad rgya gram rigs lnga'i lugs //
NK103(pe)014:343: zhes pas lnga sogs kyis mas 'degs bsdams shing /
NK103(pe)014:344: bkan te rtsa rdo rje 'bigs byed la snyag /
NK103(pe)014:345: rdo rje'i phyi sbyar ba'i snying po'i pad+ma'i nang gi 'gro 'dug gis //
NK103(pe)014:346: yab kyis dal bus mi drag par bskyod cing shes rab kyis kyang dal bus bskyang sa pas //
NK103(pe)014:347: lus 'phrig ba dang ha sa'i skad 'don rig pa bde ba'i ros gang zhing brgyal te //
NK103(pe)014:348: bcud thig le rnams g.yo na phan tshun dris la zlug cing bskyod pa'i rtsol ba klod de //
NK103(pe)014:349: drag pos phyugs thabs su spyod pa ma yin te sos dal la yun bsring sa la rol lo //
NK103(pe)014:350: rtog pa thams cad bde ba skyes pa'i dus na
NK103(pe)014:351: chos nyid ma nor ba'i don rang gsal du rtogs
NK103(pe)014:352: pa yin bas // gang skyes kyang rtog pa dang
NK103(pe)014:353: bde ba gnyis su mi rtog ste lhun gnas kyi
NK103(pe)014:354: bde ba chen po'i ngang ngo //
NK103(pe)014:355: ma h+aa'i skad cig dga' ba bcu drug gi dga' ba mchog dga' dga' bral lhan cig skyes dga'/
NK103(pe)014:356: bzhis nor bag chags pa rang ka ma bcos nas ma nor ba'i bde ba ngos 'dzin pa ni //
NK103(pe)014:357: blang dor zhib mor spyad pas lhun gnas kyi don la rtsing ngo //
NK103(pe)014:358: 'phro sa rtog pa'i de kho na nyid bstan pa
NK103(pe)014:359: des 'khrig sred rang ka ma de lhun gnas su
NK103(pe)014:360: grol // thams cad chos nyid yin pas nor ba'i gol sa med //
NK103(pe)014:361: lus bcud thig le 'khyag pa de rten phyag rgya la sbyar ba'i stobs kyis thabs kyis bzhu //
NK103(pe)014:362: chags pa'i rjes su 'brang sa nas sems 'phro ba
NK103(pe)014:363: de thabs des gtan la phab pas gshis la phebs
NK103(pe)014:364: // rten 1dang rtags 1 dang don gyi 1sgo nas dbab 111pa rnam pa gsum yin no //
NK103(pe)014:365: khams gsum dang por 'dod khams su chags pa rang ka mas smin phyir thabs 'dis grol bar rigs //
NK103(pe)014:366: kyang rdzogs pa chen po'i skabs /
NK103(pe)014:367: 'dir de la yid mi 'brang ste rnal ma nyid la ltos shig /
NK103(pe)014:368: rten gyi 'khrul ka'khor drug dang rdzas khadag gartsa //
NK103(pe)014:369: btsan ngathabs su drang ba dang calhung nas mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir gso ba'o //
NK103(pe)014:370: rgya mtsho ri rab la sbyar ba'i 'khrul 'khor lte
NK103(pe)014:371: kabas tshigs bsnyag gling bzhi ri rab la bsdu ba'i
NK103(pe)014:372: ni yan lag bzhi gsum nas //
NK103(pe)014:373: rgod po zung cig mkha' la 'phur ba ni /
NK103(pe)014:374: mig 1dang dar po che gnam la phyar ba ni /
NK103(pe)014:375: lce 111bzlog 'og rlung 'then la thig le drang //
NK103(pe)014:376: rgod ma kha rin chen rdzing du rdo rje sbu gu btsugs la rngub bo //
NK103(pe)014:377: thabs shes rab gnyis ka la rigs gsum du dbye ba ni glang po rta ri dwags //
NK103(pe)014:378: gsum thabs shes phan tshun brtags te dang po thabs kyis shes rab brtag pa ni //
NK103(pe)014:379: lag pa g.yon gyi sor mo mtheb chung ma gtogs pa'i che ba bzhis pad+mara phyin pa'i mtshams su //
NK103(pe)014:380: srad bus bskor te srad bu de la sor tshad gzhal //
NK103(pe)014:381: te glang po 'i rigs la sor bcu gnyis rta la dgu pa ste //
NK103(pe)014:382: ri dwags la sor drug bdun ldan pa'o shes rab kyis thabs kyi brtag pa yang //
NK103(pe)014:383: rdo rje bu ga'i zur nas ba gam bskor nas //
NK103(pe)014:384: bu ga'i rtsar srad bu drangs nas sor tshad gcal ba'i rigs gsum snga ma'o dang mthun pa //
NK103(pe)014:385: glang po'i rigs la glang khapo khyu pa'i 'bras bu rlig ba khrag dang bya gag sgong //
NK103(pe)014:386: rta'i rigs la rta khru pa'i 'bras bu'i khrag dang phug ron sgo nga'o //
NK103(pe)014:387: ri dwags dgo ba'i rlig khrag dang nas zan sgong nga'o //
NK103(pe)014:388: rigs gsum thun mong du bzang drug d+ha du ra thang phrom dang shug pa'i thang chu bcas //
NK103(pe)014:389: ba'i rdzas dgu cha bsnyams pas shes rab kyi pad+ma'i nang du byug /
NK103(pe)014:390: thabs la rdzas dgu po de 'gron bu sbrum ma'i rgyab nas nang du bcug la //
NK103(pe)014:391: spra tshil gyis kha bcad la lce lkog sbas nas spyad na zin ba yin //
NK103(pe)014:392: rkang lag gi mtheb chen bzhi tshigs rnams ras la dris chu sbangs pas bsdam //
NK103(pe)014:393: srin lag dbang mo'i rtsa ba ru sbom pos mtheb chen gyi mnan te khu tshur byas la //
NK103(pe)014:394: sgo bu ga dgu'i sgrol ma rlung phyir phul lus kun char khong bsdam ste drag po ma yin //
NK103(pe)014:395: dal bus dbab pa'i sbyor bas zin pa yin //
NK103(pe)014:396: gang gi 'gron bu'i rgyal po sbrum chen thabs dang shes rab gnyis ka'i sos //
NK103(pe)014:397: mnyam par bzung nas spyad na zin pa yin //
NK103(pe)014:398: zla ba gzas zin dus su'ang rang bzhin gyis zin pa yin no //
NK103(pe)014:400: gadbyings phyug gdung can btsal nas rtsa sprad phan tshun sbyor bas //
NK103(pe)014:401: rtsa gcig gi sgo rtsa gcig gis bkag pas zin pa'ang rtsa'i stobs kyis bzlog go //
NK103(pe)014:402: shes rab kyi mkha' stobs can du bsdam zhing thabs kyis rdo rjes bkan //
NK103(pe)014:403: thabs shes gnyi ga stobs ldan gyi nus pas zin pa'am //
NK103(pe)014:404: lag gis rdo rje'i rtse lkog gi rtsa bkag la
NK103(pe)014:405: sbyang ba ni chu rder 'gro srid pas bzang po
NK103(pe)014:406: min // btsan thabs su mkhar lhungs na mkha' nas
NK103(pe)014:407: thabs kyis lces blangs bsam pas ting nge 'khor lo
NK103(pe)014:409: dam rdzas kyi bcud len kyis grogs bya zhing dam tshig du thig le mi 'chor bar /
NK103(pe)014:411: lces len pa de min na'ang nya phyis sam dung chos kyi nang du blangs la //
NK103(pe)014:412: bdud rtsi sman gyi skyobs dang ldan par sna bug g.yas bkag la g.yon nyi ma'i sbu gus drang //
NK103(pe)014:413: ci nas thig le rdo rje'i kha 'am rtse ru dbyung bar mi bya'o //
NK103(pe)014:414: ro ches mi bde lci na dri chu 'don pa bzhin du gdon //
NK103(pe)014:415: sa shas ches nas cher lci na thig le byin du gdon no //
NK103(pe)014:416: 'khrul 1'khor rlung 2dang ting 3'dzin yi 4ges bzhi bzlog ste //
NK103(pe)014:417: lus tung byas te seng 1phrug rtsal sbyong mchong ba'i rdeg tshul dang 'dra ba dang //
NK103(pe)014:418: stag phrug lto drangs skyug pa'i tshul du ni //
NK103(pe)014:419: lus res bstung zhing res bsring ste bsdam pa dang klod pa rang nyams dang sad do //
NK103(pe)014:420: ngar 2skad 'dren pas dbugs drag po so'i bar ram //
NK103(pe)014:421: mchu yi bar nas dbugs drang drag tu gnan //
NK103(pe)014:422: dper na ril ba zhabs tshags bu ga nas drangs pa ltar //
NK103(pe)014:424: bcud dang 'dres pa'i rlung thig le'i sgo phye nas //
NK103(pe)014:425: stod smad du thig le a ba d+hu tir brgyus pa'i bems po'i rlung gis bsdu'o //
NK103(pe)014:426: bsam 3pas yum gyi rin chen rdzing du rdo rje'i mchu btsugs nas //
NK103(pe)014:427: barngubasa pas tshangs pa'i bu gar yar drangs nas //
NK103(pe)014:428: spyi gtsug nas 'thon nam mkha' mthongs sleb par //
NK103(pe)014:429: dkar zang 'thon bsam yab kyi rin chen rdzing gis dngos sum rngub //
NK103(pe)014:430: mgar gyi 'bud byed gyen la bzlog pa 'dra'o //
NK103(pe)014:431: a 4'am n+ri yi ge drag tu brjod de //
NK103(pe)014:432: mdzod spu ham yig la thig le gdags la shel phreng brgyus pa ltar //
NK103(pe)014:433: phata nag gzugs kyis chu lam dgag par gsal //
NK103(pe)014:434: dkar 'tsher rno gyogs gyen la khyug gis drang //
NK103(pe)014:435: yan lag lus kun 'dar chug sig gis rta'am lug ltar sprug /
NK103(pe)014:436: hig ces drag brjod gsum pa rnyebs byas la //
NK103(pe)014:437: lto ba'i nang khrol zhabs nas 'ubs bzlog pa //
NK103(pe)014:438: khor gcig phar song nas tshur 'ubs 'ong ba chu
NK103(pe)014:439: yi rlabs sam gyang 'gyel ba'am sbud pa bud bzhin
NK103(pe)014:440: no // thabs shes rang re'i rtsa gnas pa'i sa ru tshur thig le 'then rlung bsdam lus sprug /
NK103(pe)014:441: slar gyes nas kyang sa sar lus bsig cing sprug ste thig le drang //
NK103(pe)014:442: thig le gang na yong tshor ba'i sar lus bsku
NK103(pe)014:443: mnye dang thabs de dag la 'bad cing spyod lam
NK103(pe)014:444: dang zas khams dang mthun pa bsten no //
NK103(pe)014:445: thig le 'tshor ba'i skyon ni thig le kha lud
NK103(pe)014:446: pa dang chags pa skyes ba dang mi ma yin
NK103(pe)014:447: dang // nad gzhi dang zas ngan zos pa dang
NK103(pe)014:448: dam tshig nyams na thig le phyir 'byung ba yin
NK103(pe)014:449: dang // // de dag bcos thabs ni lus zungs
NK103(pe)014:450: kyi stobs ches nas thig le ma shong bar lud
NK103(pe)014:452: rkang pa sa la brdab cing yar tshangs pa'i gnas nas mar dmyal ba'i bar du sems drang //
NK103(pe)014:453: bzlog pa'i thabs la nan tan bya ba yin no //
NK103(pe)014:454: rten yid du 'ong ba la chags pa skyes pas 'chor na rkang pa re mos su sprug /
NK103(pe)014:455: h'u zhes brjod cing thig le drang zhing bzlog ste spyi gtsug gi ham la gdags par bya'o //
NK103(pe)014:456: mi min ya pa'i bar chad kyis 'chor na byin brlabs dang nus mthu dang //
NK103(pe)014:457: nyungs dkar btsan dug dpa' bo bsregs te a 'dza' nag po gu gul dang //
NK103(pe)014:458: ma'i klad chen dang pad+ma rak+tara sbyar ba de ni //
NK103(pe)014:459: dar dmar po la bskus la rdo rje'i rked par bcing lus kyi rked pa la yang dkri //
NK103(pe)014:460: yang na sho ma'i rtsa ba mer bsregs pa'i 'gal dum dang dar dmar dang //
NK103(pe)014:461: gsang bar btags la de rdo rje'i rked pa gdags so //
NK103(pe)014:462: nad gzhis drangs nas 'chor na mkhal ma bsro //
NK103(pe)014:463: gcan gzan lpags pas rked dkri drod sman bsten //
NK103(pe)014:464: bu mo drod can mchan bsten sbyor ba spang //
NK103(pe)014:465: gsang ba'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tsan+da l+ai //
NK103(pe)014:466: dmar rtsa sor gcig gi tshad tsam yod pa de steng 'og gi rlung gnyis //
NK103(pe)014:467: mas byung nas yas 'khyil yas byung nas mas 'khyil bas //
NK103(pe)014:468: me bas tshar ba gyur pa des lus kun gyi drod bslang bar bsam mo //
NK103(pe)014:469: zas ngan gyis 'chor na de 'phro bcad de 'o ma bskol ba btung //
NK103(pe)014:470: zhag gsum bar du bdud rtsi'i rgyun yang phrad dang sbyar la khong du bzlog /
NK103(pe)014:471: zas gsar bcud can dang gong gi bcud len bshad pa ltar bsten //
NK103(pe)014:472: gong gi zlog pa'i thabs rnams ni skyon drug po kun la'ang phan pa yin no //
NK103(pe)014:473: phyag rgya dang dam tshig nyams pas thig le phebs
NK103(pe)014:474: par dka' la 'chor ba rkyen te ma tshor bar
NK103(pe)014:475: 'chor // de la tshogs gtang bshags pa dang bskang
NK103(pe)014:476: ba bya zhing slob dpon la dbang nod byin rlabs
NK103(pe)014:477: 'chor // zhu'o // thig le nyams su longs pa
NK103(pe)014:478: de yi legs rtags ni mdog gsal bkrag skye gzhon
NK103(pe)014:479: 'chor // zhu'o // sha 'chags // nad med lus bde skra dkar gnyer ma spangs //
NK103(pe)014:480: ting nge gang gtad dmigs pa'i sar sems zin nas rtog pa nyams //
NK103(pe)014:481: tshe ring shes rab gsum 'phel zhing bde gshegs mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan 'byung //
NK103(pe)014:482: rigs rgyud bu tsha mi 'phel gsang ba'i longs spyod phyag rgya mtshan ldan 'phel //
NK103(pe)014:483: de yi dam rdzas nad lnga sel ba yin /
NK103(pe)014:484: thun mong gi dgos pa lnga 'grub pa yin /
NK103(pe)014:485: rigs lnga'i dngos grub 'grub pa yin pa gsum gyi nus pa'ang rdzogs //
NK103(pe)014:486: yi ge 1dang me tog 1dang thugs dang sku'i phyag rgya'i 1skye 111 mched mngon sum du gsal ba'o //
NK103(pe)014:487: la bzla ni chos can thams cad chos nyid ma nor rang snang yin bas //
NK103(pe)014:488: shan dbye ba dang nor ba bsal ba dang ma
NK103(pe)014:489: yin pa dgag mi mthun pa spang ba dang mthun
NK103(pe)014:490: par bsgyur ba la rag ma las pa ni gser
NK103(pe)014:491: la 'gyur rtsi mi sten pa ltar ro //
NK103(pe)014:492: nyom mongs bdag gzung 'dzin ltar snang yang mtshan nyid rang rig yin pas //
NK103(pe)014:493: rgyal thabs tshangs pa'i dbang klong du dpa' bos dga' rab kyi bshad //
NK103(pe)014:494: pa de dri med gsang ba'i sgron mas gsal bar byas so //
NK103(pe)014:495: byas pa des na 'jig rten dri med gsang ba'i 'bras bu smin pa ni //
NK103(pe)014:496: 'gro ba ris drug 'jig rten phal pa'i dri mas 'das nas //
NK103(pe)014:497: zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
NK103(pe)014:498: dang rang gis btags pa'i mtha' gnyis la mi gnas
NK103(pe)014:499: pa'i mya ngan las 'das par 'dod pa ni /
NK103(pe)014:500: gzung 'dzin du snang ba'i chas 'i gshis la nyan
NK103(pe)014:501: thos dgra bcom pa dang rang rgyal yid sbyin bde
NK103(pe)014:502: ba'i sa // stong cha'i gshis las byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu 'od kyi sa //
NK103(pe)014:503: bden pa gnyis kyi cha las kri ya rdo rje 'dzin dang u pa ya rdo rje 'chang //
NK103(pe)014:504: yo ga stug po bkod pa'i snang stong ro gcig bden pa gnyis med kyi cha las //
NK103(pe)014:505: ma h+aa'i pad+ma spyan dang yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen dang //
NK103(pe)014:506: a nu'i dbyings dang ye shes dbye ba med pa'i sa //
NK103(pe)014:507: rnams shes bya mu bzhi'i phyogs re khong du chud kyang bden pa'i phyogs med kyi dmar thag las //
NK103(pe)014:508: tshul bzang po'i rkyen gyis 'bras bu gong du 'pho bas mtshan nyid ni 'jig rten pa'i 'dzin kyang //
NK103(pe)014:509: 'jig rten phal pa'i dri ma med pas gnas skabs 'bras bu'i chos so //
NK103(pe)014:510: 'jig rten gyi shes bya tshogs brgyad kyi de kho na nyid gsum du lhun gyis grub //
NK103(pe)014:511: pas 'jig rten phal pa'i ris drug gis btags pa'i
NK103(pe)014:512: dri ma mi gnas par gdod nas dag /'jig rten
NK103(pe)014:513: las 'das pa'i 'bras bu brgyad kyang de nyid du
NK103(pe)014:515: rang rang gi 'dod pa'i skabs kyis mu bzhir btags
NK103(pe)014:516: pa gzhi nas dag /'khor 'das rang mtshan ma 'dres
NK103(pe)014:517: par ye shes su lhun gyis grub //
NK103(pe)014:518: mu bzhi'i ngos gzung mi gnas pas ka nas rnam par dag /
NK103(pe)014:519: mtshan nyid nas ma 'dres la ye shes kyi ngang
NK103(pe)014:520: du yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku lnga lhun gyis grub
NK103(pe)014:522: dgongs pa ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid yon tan gyi ldog chas //
NK103(pe)014:523: che ba lnga las mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang //
NK103(pe)014:524: mi gnas par rang byung gi ye shes dus gsum las grol lo //
NK103(pe)014:525: zhen drug phal pa dang rtsol brgyad kyi spyod yul du ma gyur pas //
NK103(pe)014:526: 'jig rten pa de dag nyid kyi dri ma med par gsang ba yi //
NK103(pe)014:527: 'bras bur gdod nas lhun grub yul med rang gsal yin //
NK103(pe)014:529: 'jig rten dri med gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes //
NK103(pe)014:530: brjod bya gzhi'i ming rjod par byed pa'i gzhung la btags pa'o //
NK103(pe)014:531: 'jig rten la mu lnga ste nam mkha' mi 'jig la 'byung bzhi 'jig par brten pa dang //
NK103(pe)014:532: snod 'jig pa la bcud 'jig pa brten ba dang
NK103(pe)014:533: bcud 'jig pa la reg pa mi 'jig pa brten
NK103(pe)014:534: pa dang // nam mkha' mi 'jig pa la rig
NK103(pe)014:535: pa mi 'jig pa rten par snang ba bzhi po
NK103(pe)014:536: pa dang // de thams cad // rang sar rang
NK103(pe)014:537: grol bas 'jig cing rten pa'i sgro 'dogs pa dang
NK103(pe)014:538: bral ba dang lnga yin no //
NK103(pe)014:539: yang chos nyid mi 'jig pa'i ngang las chos can gyi snang ba 'jig pa brten //
NK103(pe)014:540: chos can 'jig pa de la rten 'brel 'jig pa rang rten pa can //
NK103(pe)014:541: rten 'brel 'jig pa de la brten nas chos nyid spros bral mi 'jig pa rtogs //
NK103(pe)014:542: chos nyid dang chos dbyings mi 'jig pa de chos sku'i mi 'jig pa ngang du rten //
NK103(pe)014:543: 'jig rten bzhi po thams cad rang grol te 'jig
NK103(pe)014:544: pa dang rten pa'i sgro mdogs thams cad dang bral
NK103(pe)014:545: ba yin no // mi 'jig pa la 'jig pa rten 'jig pa la //
NK103(pe)014:546: 'jig pa rten 'jig pa la mi 'jig rten pa dang //
NK103(pe)014:547: mi 'jig pa la mi 'jig rten pa zhes tha snyad du brten pa tsam mo //
NK103(pe)014:548: 'jig rten ces sgro btags pa tsam yin pas yod pa'i dri ma med //
NK103(pe)014:549: mu lnga gang du yang ma spangs par ma 'gags
NK103(pe)014:550: pa thams cad rang 'char bas med pa'i dri ma'ang
NK103(pe)014:551: med // de nyid dang blo dngos so gnyis sam
NK103(pe)014:552: rigs shes dang tha snyad pa'i shes ngo gnyis la
NK103(pe)014:553: don dam kun rdzob gnyis su bden pas //
NK103(pe)014:554: gshis la gnyis med pas de la ltos pa'i gcig med gnyi ga med pas dri med //
NK103(pe)014:555: de ni mtshan nyid ye nas bden pa gnyis su zung du 'jug pas //
NK103(pe)014:556: yod med gnyi ga med pa dang gnyis 'dzin gcig pa'i dri ma med //
NK103(pe)014:557: mu nas yod med gnyis gnyis med bzhi kar 'char bar bden pas lhun gyis grub pa yin la //
NK103(pe)014:558: yod pas med pa med pas yod pa gnyis kyis
NK103(pe)014:559: gnyis med gnyis med kyis gnyis gcig gis gcig bkrol
NK103(pe)014:560: bas mu bzhi gang gi yang phyogs su 'dzin pa
NK103(pe)014:561: mi bden // mu bzhi mtshan nyid ma 'dres la
NK103(pe)014:562: ye shes kyi ngang du yongs su rdzogs pas phyogs
NK103(pe)014:563: lhung gi dri ma med pa //
NK103(pe)014:564: des na 'jig rten de nyid dri ma med pa'o //
NK103(pe)014:565: de nyid yul du grub pa med de rang snang ba'i phyir rtogs dka' bas //
NK103(pe)014:566: mu bzhi'i phyogs lhung gi blo la mnyam grol rang gsang thabs kyis chod de gsang ba dang //
NK103(pe)014:567: mu bzhi'i phyogs su rig kyang rang bzhin ji lta bar ma rig pas gsang //
NK103(pe)014:568: pho mo'i mtshan ma gsang ba'i dbang po ni las
NK103(pe)014:569: dang rtog mthun rnams la brda 'i ngag brjod yis
NK103(pe)014:570: de gsang // des na skyes bu chags pa can gyis nyams su blang ba'i thabs kyis gsang //
NK103(pe)014:571: gang la gsang na zong zad pa dang ma rnyed
NK103(pe)014:572: pa dang zong med pa dang ser sna can gyi
NK103(pe)014:573: // yul la gsang ba'o ci'i phyir gsang na phal cher sgro 'dogs shing skur pa 'debs pas gshe //
NK103(pe)014:574: gsang ste spyad pas yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa 'byung bar basngagasa so //
NK103(pe)014:575: rang snang yin kyang ma rig mnyam grol bstan kyang ma rtogs pa //
NK103(pe)014:576: thabs chen po 'di yis rtogs pa sla'i ba phyir na sgron ma'o //
NK103(pe)014:577: de ltar du gzhung 'di ni gnas lugs la sogs don chen lnga yis dgrol lo //
NK103(pe)014:578: snang ba sna tshogs pa nyid byang chub kyi sems su la bzla ste //
NK103(pe)014:579: de yang phung po lnga dang khams bco brgyad dang
NK103(pe)014:580: skye mched bcu gnyis dang 'byung ba lnga rnam shes
NK103(pe)014:582: ma rig pa la sogs pa rten 'brel bcu gnyis 'khor ba'i chos rgyu dang 'bras bu'o //
NK103(pe)014:583: sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol phyin drug phyi
NK103(pe)014:584: stong pa nyid la sogs pa stong pa bco brgyad
NK103(pe)014:585: dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gzhi la
NK103(pe)014:586: sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs chos sum cu rtsa
NK103(pe)014:588: 'bras bu'i gnas dang gnas min mkhyen pa'i stobs la sogs pa /
NK103(pe)014:589: stobs bcu chos kun rdzogs par byang chub pa la
NK103(pe)014:590: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa mi 'jigs pa bzhi
NK103(pe)014:591: dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa la
NK103(pe)014:593: byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang
NK103(pe)014:594: 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas
NK103(pe)014:595: kyi chos // ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa kun mkhyen //
NK103(pe)014:596: nyan thos dang rang rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa'i
NK103(pe)014:597: rgyu lam dang 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi chos dang
NK103(pe)014:598: // kri ya las dang bya bas 'i mthu rigs gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa dang //
NK103(pe)014:599: u pa ya bya ba dang rnal 'byor gnyis ka'i mthu las rigs bzhir 'char ba dang //
NK103(pe)014:600: yo ga pa bsam gtan yan lag cho 'phrul bzhi
NK103(pe)014:601: dang cho ga lnga ste dgu las 'bras bu sku
NK103(pe)014:602: dang ye shes srab mor ma gyur pas stug por
NK103(pe)014:603: bkod pa dang // ma h+aa thabs 1dang shes rab 1bskyed 1rdzogs chos sku kun tu 'od //
NK103(pe)014:604: longs sku pad+ma spyan dang yi ge 'khor lo'i sprul sku sa //
NK103(pe)014:605: a nu snang ba rgyu dbyings su bsgom 'bras bu dran rtog ye shes su 'char bas //
NK103(pe)014:606: rdzogs tshul du bsgoms pa las byung ba kun tu bzang po dbye ba med pa'i sa //
NK103(pe)014:607: thams cad ji ltar bsgrubs par gnas skabs kyi me
NK103(pe)014:608: tog 'char cing mthar thug 'bras bu mi 'char te
NK103(pe)014:609: // bsti gnas ngal sos tsam ste nges par brtan pa'i 'bras bu min pas //
NK103(pe)014:610: 'bras bu gong nas gong du bgrod dgos pas brdzun par snang //
NK103(pe)014:611: rang rang gi 'dod pas bden par snang yang gshis la sgyu mar brdzun pa snang //
NK103(pe)014:612: de gnyis tha dad mi gnas ro gcig tu snang //
NK103(pe)014:613: snang bas snang ba rang bkrol rnam dag byang //
NK103(pe)014:614: snang gzhi ma 'gags snyoms par khyab pas chub //
NK103(pe)014:615: ma 'dres yongs rdzogs rang gsal mi rtog sems //
NK103(pe)014:616: stong pa byang chub sems su la bzla ste //
NK103(pe)014:617: dbu ma rgyan gyi 'grel pa las /
NK103(pe)014:618: gal te dngos po ma grub na //
NK103(pe)014:620: dngos po gzhan du gyur ba ni //
NK103(pe)014:621: dngos med yin ces skye bo smra //
NK103(pe)014:624: 'o mar zho la sogs med gang //
NK103(pe)014:625: de ni snga ma med ces bya //
NK103(pe)014:626: zho la 'o ma med pa ni //
NK103(pe)014:627: zhig nas med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
NK103(pe)014:628: mgo yi yan lag ljang ba dang //
NK103(pe)014:629: skye dang sra ba rnam spangs pa //
NK103(pe)014:630: ri bong rwa la sogs dngos su //
NK103(pe)014:631: de ni gtan med brjod pa yin //
NK103(pe)014:632: ba glang rta la sogs med pa //
NK103(pe)014:633: de ni gcig la gcig med brjod //
NK103(pe)014:635: gdod nas yod pas stong pa ri bong rwa lta bu gtan nas med pa'i stong pa la //
NK103(pe)014:636: phyi ma bzhi po 'di dngos po gzhan du gyur pa la stong pa zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)014:637: sngar med stong pa rgyu'i dus na 'bras bu ma
NK103(pe)014:638: dmigs pa 'o ma'i dus na zho med pa lta
NK103(pe)014:639: bu // zhig nas med pa'am spyad pa'i stong pa
NK103(pe)014:640: rgyu 'bras spyad zin chos zho la 'o ma med
NK103(pe)014:641: bu // pa lta bu // phyogs gcig pa'i stong
NK103(pe)014:642: pa ni sa phyogs bum pas stong pa lta bu
NK103(pe)014:643: bu // pa lta bu // // 'gyur ba'i stong pa skad cig snga phyi'i chos //
NK103(pe)014:644: blos brtags pas stong pa ni rigs pa'i shes pas
NK103(pe)014:645: snang ba la gzhigs pa'i na dngos po chos kyis
NK103(pe)014:646: stong // blos brtags pa'i mtha' las grol ba'i stong nyid ni //
NK103(pe)014:647: shes byed rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa la //
NK103(pe)014:648: shes bya rnam dag chos dbyings 'gag pa med pa skye med pa //
NK103(pe)014:649: chad pa med pa rtag med pa //
NK103(pe)014:651: tha dad don min don gcig min //
NK103(pe)014:653: yul dang yul can du rtog bcas kyi shes bas brtags kyang //
NK103(pe)014:654: don gyi ngo bo nyid la smra brjod kyi mtha' las 'das ba'i stong pa nyid yin la //
NK103(pe)014:655: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ni chos can snang ba'i ngo bo nyid //
NK103(pe)014:657: nges par gzung ba'i spros pas stong pas chos nyid spros pa med pa'i chig chod yin //
NK103(pe)014:658: la mur thug pa phyang chad stong pas lung gi
NK103(pe)014:659: phyogs tsam pa snang tshad chos la skur ba 'debs
NK103(pe)014:660: pa // la la tshe snga phyi dang nges par
NK103(pe)014:661: legs pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la skur ba 'debs
NK103(pe)014:662: pa // te stong // stong pa de dag ngo ma shes na cis te stong //
NK103(pe)014:663: par 'gyur te mi 'gyur la shes na /
NK103(pe)014:664: stong par shes pa'i rig pa mi 'gag cing //
NK103(pe)014:665: stong par sgro btags yin pas ngo bos snang ba nyid yin no //
NK103(pe)014:666: snang ba de nyid gang gi yang ngos gzung las 'das pas stong ngo //
NK103(pe)014:667: snang stong de nyid tha dad bral bas gnyis kyis stong ngo //
NK103(pe)014:668: gnyis med kyi 'ang ris su ma zin te gnyis ltar snang zhing gsal lo //
NK103(pe)014:669: stong pa mu bzhir ma 'gags pa'i rig pa ni thams cad mkhyen pas chub //
NK103(pe)014:670: stong pas stong par 'dzin pa'i mtha' rang sar bkrol
NK103(pe)014:671: bas stong pa kho nar 'dzin pa rnam par dag
NK103(pe)014:672: pas byang // stong pa'i mu bzhi ma 'dres la
NK103(pe)014:673: stong pa'i ngang du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin
NK103(pe)014:675: phyi nang gi snang bar btags pa'i dngos po rnams rigs pa'i shes pas bkag byas nas //
NK103(pe)014:676: brtags stong 'dzin pa'i rigs shis kyi snang ba de
NK103(pe)014:677: lam mnyam bzhag rnam par mi rtog pa goms pa
NK103(pe)014:679: rigs shes kyi snang ba dang mthar thug pa ni sa bcu'i ye shes kyi rigs //
NK103(pe)014:680: shes yin la de 'gegs pa'i gnyen po ye shes nyid min na gzhan gang yin //
NK103(pe)014:681: me yis me bskyed pa bzhin du ye shes khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ba min nam //
NK103(pe)014:682: me yis bud shing zad pa'i mthun phyogs gcig mthong pas //
NK103(pe)014:683: yang dag pa'i rigs par 'gyur ba min te ji
NK103(pe)014:684: ltar na mu stegs nam mkha'i gos can pa shing
NK103(pe)014:685: // ti ti ting ka mtshan mo lo ma 'khum pa'i rtags la brten nas //
NK103(pe)014:686: shing rnams la srog dang bcas par sgrub pa de yang dag pa'i rigs par 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)014:687: de ltar ye shes med par 'dod na stong pa
NK103(pe)014:688: chad lta ba sdig can de ka ye shes med
NK103(pe)014:690: des na sems kyi rang bzhin rnam pa'i thams cad
NK103(pe)014:691: kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems yin
NK103(pe)014:692: no // rigs pas ma brtags pa'i blo la tha snyad pa'i shes pa'i ngor //
NK103(pe)014:693: nyams dga' ba'i phyi'i yul dang nang sems sam sgyu ma'am rig pa'am //
NK103(pe)014:694: lha yi dkyil 'khor wa le snang ma 'gags //
NK103(pe)014:695: pa rnams brtags na gshis la rigs pa'i shes pa'i ngor //
NK103(pe)014:696: spros pa'i mthar dang bral te rang bzhin med //
NK103(pe)014:697: pa de gnyis ri bong mgo dang rwa bzhin du //
NK103(pe)014:698: rtog bcas kyi shes pa'i ngor ldog pa so sor bcas pas tha dad du smra //
NK103(pe)014:699: dngos su na de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med de //
NK103(pe)014:700: yang dag par gcig pa'am yang dag par tha dad pa min pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)014:701: tha snyad pa'i blo la kun rdzob dang dngos po
NK103(pe)014:702: rigs shes don dam ste shes ngo gnyis kyi yul
NK103(pe)014:703: du smra ba'i // mu gnyis yang dag par na gcig min pas gcig gi mtha' las grol //
NK103(pe)014:704: yang dag par na tha dad kyang min pas gnyis kyi mtha' las grol //
NK103(pe)014:705: rigs pas ma rnyed bas yod pa'i mtha' las grol //
NK103(pe)014:706: blo la cir yang mi 'gag pas med pa'i mtha' las grol te //
NK103(pe)014:707: mtha' bzhi rang grol ye nas rnam dag byang //
NK103(pe)014:708: bzlog pas mtha' bzhi ka la snyom par khyab pas chub //
NK103(pe)014:709: mu bzhi mtshan nyid nas ma 'dres la ye shes
NK103(pe)014:710: kyi ngang du yongs su rdzogs pas rang gsal mi
NK103(pe)014:712: tha snyad shes ngor blo la snang bas 'khrul //
NK103(pe)014:713: dngos po rigs pa'i shes ngor spros bral bden //
NK103(pe)014:714: pas mtha' bzhi rang grol mi 'thad ce na go yis //
NK103(pe)014:715: sngar bshad pa'i brtags stong ji ltar la bzlas tshul dang 'dir mtshungs par sbyar ro //
NK103(pe)014:716: snang ba lha'am rig pa bde ba'i chos //
NK103(pe)014:717: de nyid rang bzhin med pas stong pa nyid //
NK103(pe)014:718: yin te dper na gser dang gser gyi ser po dbyer med pa ji lta bar //
NK103(pe)014:719: thabs 1dang shes rab 1snang 1stong 1dbyer med du zung du 'jug /
NK103(pe)014:720: gzhan gyi blo la bstan pa'i thabs su tshig tu re mos du brjod pa ni //
NK103(pe)014:721: gu ljo byis pa shes bya rim gyis sbyong ba'i tshul ltar //
NK103(pe)014:722: blo gros zhan na nyams blang cho ga lnga gsum gyis bskyed pa'ang dpe de'o dang 'dra //
NK103(pe)014:723: don du bden pa chig chod yin pas 'jug pa'i rim pa lnga'i bye brag cung zad med //
NK103(pe)014:724: de yang gnyis su med ces btags pa de //
NK103(pe)014:725: shes bya'i mu bzhi steng nas ngos gzung sgro btags nyid //
NK103(pe)014:726: sgro btags ba zhen nas 'dogs kyi gong gi bden
NK103(pe)014:727: pa gnyis kyang sgro btags nyid du zhen nas gdags
NK103(pe)014:728: // khyod kyis gnyis med gzung ba'i snang ba la de nyid gshis la stong //
NK103(pe)014:729: snang stong de gnyis su ma 'gags la snang stong
NK103(pe)014:730: gnyis su mi gnas pa de mu bzhi rdzogs so
NK103(pe)014:731: // mu bzhi ma dmigs pas byang 1la ma 'gags par chub 1par gnas //
NK103(pe)014:732: gsal la mi rtog sems 1nyid rang gsal ba //
NK103(pe)014:733: de gsum 111ro gcig bden brdzun rang sar grol bas mu bzhi bden brdzun spangs so //
NK103(pe)014:734: mu bzhi gcig ste re re la'ang bzhi bzhi rdzogs kyang mthar ma zhen te rang grol ba de //
NK103(pe)014:735: nges par blo'i gting du yid ches the tshom gcad do //
NK103(pe)014:736: de rtogs na rgyal ba'i sras po blo dang ldan pa rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
NK103(pe)014:737: 'da' med rnam pa gsum shes bya mu bzhi du ma'i rjes su shes pa mi 'brang bar //
NK103(pe)014:738: shes byed kyi blo rang sar grol na shes bya'i rtsa ba chod //
NK103(pe)014:739: pa yin te dper na sdong po'i rtsa ba chod na yal 'dab zhi ba bzhin no //
NK103(pe)014:740: de yang rnam shes tshogs brgyad las kun gzhi byang chub sems //
NK103(pe)014:742: ma rtogs rnyog pas sbags pas tshogs bdun gyis bzhag pa'i //
NK103(pe)014:743: bag chags kyi gzhi ru smin pa ni sbyor ba don gyi kun gzhi //
NK103(pe)014:744: tshogs bdun po grol na bag chags rnyog pa sbyor don dngas //
NK103(pe)014:745: byang chub kyi sems gzhi lhun gsum gyi don yon tan gyi gzugs brnyan shar //
NK103(pe)014:746: tshogs bdun las sgo lnga'i rnam shes yul lngar gsal la mi rtog kyang //
NK103(pe)014:747: yid kyi sa de dag rjes su 'brangs nas yul lnga la mtshan mar bzung //
NK103(pe)014:748: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kun gzhi la kha nang du bltas nas //
NK103(pe)014:749: nga bdag phrar 'dzin yid kyis de'i rjes su 'brangs nas //
NK103(pe)014:750: ma rig pa'i bdag dang bdag gir myong ba'i phung
NK103(pe)014:751: po gzung 'dzin nyon mongs pa lnga nye nyon sogs
NK103(pe)014:752: 'dzin // yid kyi rnam shes ni sgo lnga dang nyon yid de gnyis kyi rjes su'ang 'brang //
NK103(pe)014:753: rang gi rigs mthun gyi shes rgyud skad cig snga ma tsam gyi rjes su 'ang 'brang //
NK103(pe)014:754: skye lugs de gsum gnas lugs lhun grub gsum las ma 'das la //
NK103(pe)014:755: sprul chos longs kyi thug phrad gsum gyis skye lugs
NK103(pe)014:756: gsum po de ltar lhun grub gsum las ma 'das
NK103(pe)014:758: ngo 'phrod de rtogs pa de yi so la brtag dpyad med par gzhag /
NK103(pe)014:759: rjes su sgom skyon ci skyes thams cad ye shes rang gsal yin bas //
NK103(pe)014:761: mi spang rang rgyal ltar mi dgag byang sems ltar /
NK103(pe)014:763: phyi rgyud ltar mi bsgyur nang rgyud ltar mi bsgrub
NK103(pe)014:764: phar spro ba tshur bsdu'i ba rtsol ba dang bral
NK103(pe)014:766: ye nas 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pas rgyus bskyed pa dang da gzod sgrub tu med de //
NK103(pe)014:767: ma nor bcos su med kyis rang po'i ngang la
NK103(pe)014:768: zhog /'bras bu 'dod pa'i blo yi rtsol ba lhod
NK103(pe)014:769: kyis klod la lhug par zhog cig /
NK103(pe)014:770: des na bla ma dam pas yul med du bstan pa'i ngang dran pa tsam mo //
NK103(pe)014:771: rtags dang mtshan ma gnyis kyis tshad la dbab pa
NK103(pe)014:772: ni rtags 0mtshan 0 rang 0la shar nas gzhan 0
NK103(pe)014:773: la snang // bar chad bdud kyi dbang du ma gyur pas //
NK103(pe)014:774: nang rtags phyi ru shar ba gzhan la'ang snang //
NK103(pe)014:775: 'phrang lnga brgal na bdud las thar ba yin //
NK103(pe)014:776: dang po sems skye dka' ba'i 'phrang srun ni //
NK103(pe)014:777: ma rig sgrib pa'i phung pos srung bas na //
NK103(pe)014:778: gdams ngag la 'dren pa'i slob dpon skyabs 'gro byed du gzhug pa dang thugs rjes drang //
NK103(pe)014:779: bstan pa'i sgor 'jug par dka' ba'i 'phrang srun 'jig rten pa'i lha //
NK103(pe)014:780: yis bdag gir bzung nas srung bas de chos srung la //
NK103(pe)014:781: mchod sbyin bya ba dang dkon mchog la skyabs 'gro
NK103(pe)014:782: dang theg chen du sems bskyed pa dang dad pa
NK103(pe)014:784: 'dren pas 'i slob dpon gyi dang du blangs la
NK103(pe)014:785: myang 'das kyi khe pa dang 'khor ba'i nyen bstan
NK103(pe)014:786: // don rtogs par dka' ba'i 'phrang srun ni shes bya'i yin lugs la sgrib pa dang //
NK103(pe)014:787: 'jig rten gyi mi ma yin gnag phyogs 'gas kyang bgegs byed par srid pa'ang yod //
NK103(pe)014:790: 111111 / shes rgyud 'grol ba'i bla mas shes rab bskyed //
NK103(pe)014:791: ma sun par byas te go rim ma 'khrugs par nan tan gyis legs par gzud //
NK103(pe)014:792: dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon dang man ngag lung gis slob dpon gyi mthu bstang ngo //
NK103(pe)014:793: so so skye bo las ring du 'phags pa thob
NK103(pe)014:794: par dka' ba'i 'phrang srun ni chos skyong phal ba
NK103(pe)014:795: dang // gtor zan 'jig rten pa'i lha 'dre dang le lo dang g.yeng ba yin pas //
NK103(pe)014:796: bdud kyis ma g.yengs pa'i snga gong nas yi dam 1bde gshegs 1skyabs 11su 'gro //
NK103(pe)014:797: lha bsgom sngags bzlas dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon dang 1man ngag lung 1gi slob dpon dang //
NK103(pe)014:798: nyams chag skong bas 'i slob dpon gsum gyis grogs 111bya 'jig rten gyi g.yeng ba spangs //
NK103(pe)014:799: le lo'i dgra gzhom ste brtson pas nyams su blang //
NK103(pe)014:800: rig pa gar bskyongs kyi rang gi nyams dang gdams pa bstun pa bsten //
NK103(pe)014:801: mthar phyin par dka' ba'i 'phrang srun ni thams cad
NK103(pe)014:802: mkhyen pa kho na la sgrib pas shes bya'i sgrib
NK103(pe)014:803: pa dang // bar chod kyi bdud kyang gnod pa'i khyab 'jug byed pa yin //
NK103(pe)014:804: drod dang rtags dang mngon shes cho 'phrul rnam 'byung //
NK103(pe)014:805: ba la don mi shes par dga' brod dang nga rgyal rlom pas skyes pa bar du gcod pas //
NK103(pe)014:806: gnas lugs rang byung lha yi lha la skyabs su 'gro ba ni //
NK103(pe)014:807: drod rtags mngon shes thams cad rang byung rig pa'i ye shes kyi cho 'phrul lam //
NK103(pe)014:808: rtsal lam byin rlabs sam rang 'od dam rang snang bas //
NK103(pe)014:809: bshad pa der shes na gnas lugs ngang la gnas pas drod rtags rang sar mthar phyin //
NK103(pe)014:810: te phyin pa la nang rtags /
NK103(pe)014:811: phyi ru shar ba ni bla ma d+aa ki'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ya mtshan can snang ba dang //
NK103(pe)014:812: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las bzlog ste mi mthun te snang ba la zhen pa bral //
NK103(pe)014:813: shes rab rang 'bar shar bas don du 'gyur ba la mkhas //
NK103(pe)014:814: ci la'ang thogs med mkhyen pas rang gzhan gyi the tshom gcod //
NK103(pe)014:815: de la sogs pa rtags mtshan brjod kyis mi lang gzhan du brtag go //
NK103(pe)014:816: brjod bya lhun gnas bde chen ni 'di zhes gcig ces kyi grangs las 'das te //
NK103(pe)014:817: tha dad mi gnas bar thun mong min pa'i thig le nyag gcig yin pas //
NK103(pe)014:818: de rtogs shing goms pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i dgongs pa'ang thig le nyag gcig yin //
NK103(pe)014:819: gzhi lam de nyid mthar phyin pa'i rgyal ba'i dgongs pa yang //
NK103(pe)014:820: ye shes nyag gcig klong du lhun gyis grub bo //
NK103(pe)014:821: ming gis gcig pa tsam ni ban glang dang rta
NK103(pe)014:822: dang mi dang ma he la sogs pa ni ming
NK103(pe)014:824: ngo bos tha dad nyid yin no phyogs tsam du gcig pa ni //
NK103(pe)014:825: dbang phyug dang khyab 'jug dang ser skya dang gzegs
NK103(pe)014:826: zan la sogs pa'i phyogs su rtag lta kun bsdus
NK103(pe)014:827: pa'o // ngo bo rdzas gcig la ldog pa'i chos gnyis brten pas gcig pa ni //
NK103(pe)014:828: 'grub byed rgyu rkyen gyis bskyed de byas pa dang
NK103(pe)014:829: 'jig byed skad cig gnyis par mi sdod pas mi
NK103(pe)014:830: rtag pa rdzas // bum pa'i dngos por ngo bo gcig pa'o //
NK103(pe)014:831: cha shas med pas gcig pa ni rdul phran phyogs cha dang bral bar blos brtags pa'o //
NK103(pe)014:832: rnam pa gcig dang gnyis la sogs pa bgrang du
NK103(pe)014:833: med pa'i gcig pa ni thun mong min pa'i nyag
NK103(pe)014:834: gcig go // de la gzhan gyi zla med pa'i gcig tu'ang tshig gis mtshon par rung ba yin //
NK103(pe)014:835: tha dad ces gcig las bzlog pa'i chos ma spangs kyang mi gnas par //
NK103(pe)014:836: phyogs ris med par kun la khyab pas blos bsam yas pa'i thig le nyag gcig go //
NK103(pe)014:837: de'i yon tan gyi ldog cha nas mu bzhi cir bgrangs pa dang gang bsgrubs kyang bden pas //
NK103(pe)014:838: thun mong ma yin pa'i du ma chen po'ang zhes brjod pa 'thad //
NK103(pe)014:839: rang bzhin dbyer med ni chos kun gyi spyi'i mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs //
NK103(pe)014:841: gcig ste rnam pa 'i grangs yongs kyis de la bsgrub tu med //
NK103(pe)014:842: 'khor 'das kyi dngos po kun nyag gcig klong chen
NK103(pe)014:843: der dril te bstan kyang blo gros mu matha'i phyogs
NK103(pe)014:844: su lhung bas // de ma rtogs te ming tsam la skur pa 'debs bas tshig sbas te gab //
NK103(pe)014:845: don ni tshig tu bstan kyang mi go bas rang gsang sbas //
NK103(pe)014:846: des na rang gnas gnas lugs ni rang gi mig gis mig ma rig bzhin ma rig pa'o //
NK103(pe)014:847: kye bod pa ho dgyes pa bzhin bzang dge slong che //
NK103(pe)014:848: 'gro drug gi snang tshul so sor zhen pas rang 'thad smras //
NK103(pe)014:849: mu stegs ni ston pa dang bstan pa'i nyid rkyen log pas phyin ci log la drangs te //
NK103(pe)014:850: ther zur pa dang chad pa'i mthar bcings //
NK103(pe)014:851: mkhas pa sgra dang gnyis la blo 'brangs te mu matha'i //
NK103(pe)014:852: phyogs re rtogs te rtsol brgyad rang rang 'dod pa'i don la sgrub //
NK103(pe)014:853: btsun po rang srung gzhan la dpyas //
NK103(pe)014:854: zhi gnas sgom chen nyams kyis brid //
NK103(pe)014:855: thams cad nga bden pha bsad 'dra ba'i //
NK103(pe)014:856: rang 'dod zhog la thun mong gzu bo'i blos //
NK103(pe)014:857: shes bya spyi sar zhog la ltos //
NK103(pe)014:858: mu bzhi'i chos la phyogs ma 'dzin //
NK103(pe)014:859: ma h+aa'i gnyis med gnyis su med pa'ang min te spyod yul dang bral ba ni //
NK103(pe)014:860: dgongs pas bstan pa yin gyi sgra ji bzhin min //
NK103(pe)014:861: ma bcos ngang la rtogs pas bder gnas na //
NK103(pe)014:862: gnyis med dang gnyis su bcas pa thams cad rang tang du zhog cig /
NK103(pe)014:863: e ma 'o ngam pa thams cad rang rang gi phyogs la smra //
NK103(pe)014:864: tshad mas tshad ma phan tshun sun 'byin par //
NK103(pe)014:865: mkhas rnams rang gi zhe 'dod kyi khong skran chas //
NK103(pe)014:866: bden pa'i sa don bstan pa mi thub ba kye snying rje //
NK103(pe)014:867: de rnam don la mkhas pa rnams mya ngan gyi gnas su 'gyur //
NK103(pe)014:868: bslabs kyang mi go bstan kyang mi mthong ba //
NK103(pe)014:869: 'di la thugs rje thabs mkhas rnams kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas //
NK103(pe)014:870: khyad 'phags rmad byung thabs kyis 'dren mdzad nas //
NK103(pe)014:871: thams cad phyogs lhung rang grol sar gnas shog /
NK103(pe)014:872: dad 'dun stabs kyis rten bzang gzhi bsags kyang //
NK103(pe)014:873: las kyi stobs kyis gnod sbyin mo lus thob //
NK103(pe)014:874: bdag la rjes gzung brtsam pa'i gnyer med kyang //
NK103(pe)014:875: gter nor dregs pas skyo bas rten la 'phangs //
NK103(pe)014:876: mos pa'i mthu yis dam pa'i spyan sngar mchis //
NK103(pe)014:877: 'brel pa'i mthu yis las 'phro thugs rjes bzung //
NK103(pe)014:878: smon rtsol drag pos byang chub myu gu smin //
NK103(pe)014:879: dge slong grub mtha' sa zung dgongs nus thon //
NK103(pe)014:880: bsgyur dka' rdo rje sems dpas grogs mdzad nas //
NK103(pe)014:881: dam pas byin brlabs bdag gi shes rab mthus //
NK103(pe)014:882: gdul bya smin nas bskul ba'i rkyen 'di bkod //
NK103(pe)014:883: nor 'gal 'khrul pa mchis rnams khyed la bshags //
NK103(pe)014:884: dka' bas 'bad pas kun kyang 'dir rtogs nas //
NK103(pe)014:885: thabs dang shes rab sbrel mar brgyud nas kyang //
NK103(pe)014:886: sgro skur mi mthun gshe ba'i sems bor nas //
NK103(pe)014:887: pha spad ma smad ming sring yon mchod dang //
NK103(pe)014:888: mkhan slob rje 'bangs nye drung gcugs sems ldan //
NK103(pe)014:889: mthun pas 'grogs shing bde chen sar gnas smon //
NK103(pe)014:890: 'di dag mkha' 'gro gnyan la dpang btsugs bcol //
NK103(pe)014:891: gang zag snod min bsgrags pas skur gshe smod //
NK103(pe)014:892: rnal 'byor yo ga'i gnas 'gyur sba bar ba //
NK103(pe)014:893: glegs bam tshad kyang sor bcu gnyis par bya //
NK103(pe)014:894: sba ba bde phyir de yang gnas dben par //
NK103(pe)014:895: phyi yi dbyibs kyang mi mthong de ltar sba //
NK103(pe)014:896: gsum mang gcig nyung tshab 'theb gnyis la zhog /
NK103(pe)014:897: nyams len nus la man ngag rang grol sbyin //
NK103(pe)014:898: brjed pa dran nus yig chung sna tshang sbyin //
NK103(pe)014:899: ma 'khyams ma rul ma zags legs par bcang //
NK103(pe)014:900: 'jig rten dri ma med pa gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba //
NK103(pe)014:901: phyag na rdo rje thugs kyi rig pa las //
NK103(pe)014:902: klu'i rgyal po las ma bcos bla ma'i sa non pa //
NK103(pe)014:903: gnod sbyin mo byang chub kyis mdzad pa //
